sentences.sentence: Listen up. a true duelist doesn't back off from nobody cuz only cowards don't stand up to a challenge!
sentences.translation: 听着，一个真正的斗士绝对不会后退的，只有懦夫才不敢面对挑战！

sentences.sentence: We are not brave duelist against unfairness. What we can do is only to accept it, doesn't it?This was mother.
sentences.translation: 我们不是勇敢的抗争者，那就只能接受命运的安排，不是吗？
